room_title: Escape room "Houdini's Séance" by Bam! in Zeeland
room_description:
An eccentric killer created an elaborate tribute to legendary escape artist Harry Houdini. You bribed the estate's caretaker to give you access, but he double-crossed you by locking you in!

"I'd become an escape artist if I were you," he screamed. "My boss will be back in an hour."

Now, you must discover the secret code word Harry agreed to send to his wife from beyond the grave to prove or disprove spiritualism. 

Find the word and you'll escape. Fall short… and you'll fall victim.
